overview: "In Abducted a hot and curious young man gets abducted by two rippling-muscled railroad workers. Star Struck offers an explosion of energy after a strenuous hike through the mountains. Buddies features two buddies unleashing their man lust on each other. Light My Fire is shot on a rug next to a fireplace, as two jocks light each other's fires. Redwood Fantasy, set within a backdrop of towering redwoods, has a young sweaty stud working his giant tool to towering heights of excitement."
title: Abducted
